## Loadd and Readd data

By using the `loadd()` or `readd()` function from drake hard-coded in the .Rmd report the dependencies between the report and calculated values are automatically determined.

```{r}
loadd(ddsData_Aorta)
loadd(ddsData_Liver)
loadd(filter_ddsData_Aorta)
loadd(filter_ddsData_Liver)
```

Now we have 4 variables in the workspace

## Show aorta data

Before filtering

```{r}
ddsData_Aorta
```

After filtering

```{r}
filter_ddsData_Aorta
```

## Show liver data

Before filtering

```{r}
ddsData_Liver
```

After filtering

```{r}
filter_ddsData_Liver
```
